rubrics.standard: Listen to the sentences, and repeat what you hear.
rubrics.record: Listen to the sentences, and repeat what you hear. Click on the buttons to listen, record, and playback.

question.sentence: Most birds can fly, but PENGUINS can't.
Most cats can't swim very well, but OUR cat can.
Most dogs enjoy eating bones, but OUR dog doesn't.
Lots of people have never lived abroad, but I have.
Not many of my friends collect stamps, but I do.
My sister and I are going on holiday this year, but my PARENTS aren't.
Most people's eyes are brown or blue, but YOURS aren't.
Not many men have beards these days, but my BROTHER does.
Lots of teachers don't shout, but our teacher DOES!
Lots of people have eaten Japanese food, but WE haven't.
